title: FK you riot and your MATCHMAKING
body:
YES FK YOU RIOT, 

I'M gold and i get matched with people who just hit level 30 in my team

ARE YOU FKING SERIOUS!

fk you riot !

replies.body:
The baseline MMR for a new player in Ranked is somewhere mid-low Silver. It's not uncommon to get placed with them if your MMR is also that low (hint: your MMR *is* too low).

If you don't want to get placed with the average new player you'll have to raise your MMR above the new player average.

tell me HOW DA FK I CAN DO THAT IF I'M CONSTANTLY TEAMED WITH THEM?????????????????

LMFAO!
